dialogues.text: Peter writes on the blackboard.  He is writing:  Eventual revenge...  He stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.  Remember is a separate sentence. They key is in the long sentence Everything with him has been word games.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He erases what he wrote and starts to write again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands back and studies it.  His eyes dart across the message like a chessboard, calculating, evaluating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank taps Andy on the shoulder and they start back down hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter erases the word "PLANNED"  and adds "ARRANGED" at t bottom.  He studies it for a moment, then closes his eyes turns around and takes a few steps, then stops dead in hi tracks.  His eyes open wide as a thought crashes into his He turns around and stares at the board confirming what h already knows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank and Andy walk into the room.  Peter is on the verge being hysterical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The message!  I figured out--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy moves towards Peter and grabs him.  Peter plows into slamming his full body weight him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's going to kill my daughter!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter gets the blackboard and erases all of the letters b first one of each word.  It now spells:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank and Andy look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A full-blown storm is raging outside as Erica enters the She turns on the lights and walks towards the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank stands before Peter.  He is frantic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you understand what I'm telling you?  That's why he wants me out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand that this is just another one of your games.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I'll do anything you want!  I'll sign anything you want!  Just send a car out to the hotel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica sits on her bed.  Behind her the DRAPES to her WIND OPEN.  Outside LIGHTNING FLASHES SILHOUETTING a MAN stand the BALCONY in the rain.  Erica senses something and turn around.  A moment later there is another FLASH OF LIGHTNI but the MAN is no longer there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter slams his hand down on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright!  I confess!  I killed them!! I killed them all!  Now, will you please send a car to the hotel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kathy continues searching through the files.  She brings another one and stares at it.  Confusion fills her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She raises her finger to the screen, tracing the words as reads them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank watches Peter as he signs a confession.  Frank grab arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, c'mon Peter.  We're moving you to a cell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I signed the confession.  What about the car?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank leads Peter into the room.  Officer Harton is behin desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the hell is Andy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He took off about ten minutes ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Harton)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you send the car?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over, Peter.  Let's stop the games.  I'm not sending a car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something in Peter snaps.  Rage fills him as he crashes h body into Frank's, then quickly strips Frank's pistol out his belt.  He holds it out in his handcuffed hands, point Harton before he can even get up from his seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get up!  Real slow and put your hands on the desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harton does what he's told.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Frank)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop the keys to the cuffs on the ground and kick them over to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank drops the keys and kicks them over.  Peter bends do his eyes on Frank and Harton.  Slowly he removes the cuff

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright!  Let's move down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE MOVE down the hall with them.  Peter motions for them inside the Conference room.  They do.  Peter closes the d and LOCKS it from the outside.  As Peter runs out of the station the PHONE starts to RING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is at her desk, on the PHONE, listening as it RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter runs out and gets into  Frank's car.  He drives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA MOVES IN towards a WINDOW on the other side of DARKENED ROOM.  Suddenly, a GLOVED HAND smashes through t GLASS and reaches inside.  At the same time a CLAP of THU booms overhead, covering most of the noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica is watching TV. She gets up, thinking she has heard something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica enters the DARK ROOM and cautiously walks over to t LIGHT SWITCH located next to a DOOR that leads to the liv room.  She is just about to turn the SWITCH when... There LONG FLASH OF LIGHTNING.  Suddenly, her expression turns of horror as she sees something in the next room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ERICA'S POV:  On the other side of the LIVING ROOM is a L MIRROR.  The LIGHTNING LIGHTS the room well enough for he see A MAN'S SILHOUETTE in the MIRROR.  He is standing on other side of the doorway, his back pressed up against th wall, waiting for her to enter the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSERT LIGHT SWITCH:  Erica slowly starts to move her han from the SWITCH when a HAND GRABS her firmly by the WRIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON ERICA:  She is startled, but quickly relaxes as she lo at someone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy!  You scared me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a KNOCK at the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter pulls his car in and skids to stop.  As he gets out sees Andy's car parked close by.  He runs towards the bui

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter rushes frantically towards room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter rushes inside and runs across the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica!  Erica!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter runs towards Erica's room.  A NOTE is taped to her It reads: CHECK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lightning lights up the sky.  Before the THUNDER comes we Peter's frantic cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Kathy through the windshield as she drives through storm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter sits by the phone in the dark.  He stares at the PH almost willing it to ring.  In a FLASH OF LIGHTNING he se pool of blood flowing out under the closet door.  Slowly walks towards the door, he reaches to open it, then hesit afraid of what might be behind the door.  He takes a deep breath, then opens it quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER'S POV:  A FLASH OF LIGHTNING highlights Andy's life body as it falls out of the closet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter is startled as he backs away from the body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two UNIFORMED OFFICERS enter and notice that no one is at desk.  In the b.g. they HEAR someone POUNDING on a door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RAIN falls in sheets.  Frank runs out and gets into a patrol car and drives off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PHONE RINGS.  Peter runs to the cordless phone and li up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Congratulations on your daring escape. You just missed me by a few seconds. (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's check, Peter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me speak to my daughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's in the other room.  I just wanted you to know she wasn't dead... yet. But it's time for her to die now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please... wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The game's over.  You lost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's me you want.  Not her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  As usual you're wrong.  It is her I want.  Killing you would be easy. Living with the consequences of losing will be much more of a defeat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter HEARS a faint RATTLING SOUND in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That wouldn't be very sporting. Remember Huxley?  "His play is always fair and just."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're groping.  I have been fair. It's my move now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll give you anything you want. Anything!  Please!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't beg, Peter.  She has to die.  I can't win unless she dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter hears the SOUND again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was thinking about leaving the phone line open so you could hear her die -- but I've decided it's better if you don't know exactly when I kill her. Good-bye Peter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  Wait!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The line goes dead.  Peter's mind races.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few seconds!  Where could he have gone in a few seconds?  Think!  Think, Goddamit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks towards the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER'S POV:  of the wind blowing through the trees outsi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter's face floods with realization.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steam pipes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter dials a THREE DIGIT number on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MAN wearing a black rain-coat walks across the room t an alcove.  The door to the alcove is OPEN and we see Eri is tied to a chair and gagged.  WATER FLOODS in through c in the foundation flooding the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PHONE RINGS.  He stops, startled by the sound, his he snapping towards the phone.  The MAN is stunned.  His min races.  He thinks for a moment.  He walks back to the pho slowly lifts the receiver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know where you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very good.  How did you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pipes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MAN looks at the PIPES.  They RATTLE.  The realizatio his mistake dawns on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent.  It doesn't matter.  You still lose.  She'll still be dead before you can get down here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MAN slams down the receiver. CLICK!  The blade snaps the STILETTO.  He walks quickly back towards the alcove, KNIFE  clutched tightly in his hand.  He stops for a mome the door, as he prepares for the act ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica stares at him as he approaches with wide-eyed terro The MAN moves towards her then stops, sensing something i wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door slowly CLOSES revealing Peter standing behind it Frank's gun aimed at him in one hand, the CORDLESS PHONE other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dryly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Checkmate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter turns on the LIGHTS.  The MAN turns around.  It is the computer technician.  He slowly brings the KNIFE to h side, hiding it behind his leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd you know I wouldn't be in the same room with her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You told me.  When you called you said she was in the other room.  Drop the knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Caller shrugs his shoulder, then drops it.  They star each other.  David takes a little step closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Computers.  That's how you got into Homesearchers records.  You can get into anything.  But why?  Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still haven't figured it out, have you?   You think that I've put you through an ordeal.  My scars run so much deeper than yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What scars?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (moving closer)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scars on your chest.  From where I stabbed you with my fountain pen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shock pours over Peter's face as his mind drifts back to tournament twenty years ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were only children.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David lunges at Peter.  Peter raises the gun.  Too late! is too close.  He pushes Peter's hand away.  They struggl the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kathy enters and starts to move down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kathy runs outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The struggle continues.  David butts his head into Peter' nose, then slams him into the wall again.  THE GUN FIRES the air.  At the same moment a CLAP OF THUNDER BOOMS over

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kathy does not HEAR the SHOT.  In the b.g. we see Frank r towards her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David repeatedly smashes Peter's hand into the wall.  THE FIRES INTO THE AIR SEVERAL TIMES.  A bullet hits an over PIPE.  STEAM FLOODS the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank hears the shots and runs towards the SOUND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David smashes Peter's hand into the wall until the gun fa the ground, disappearing under the water.  He grabs Peter lifting him into the air, displaying brute strength, his is unleashed.  He slams Peter's back into the wall, knock the wind out of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank races through the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fight continues.  STEAM SWIRLS through the room.  Dav slams his elbow into Peter's face.  Blood pours out of Pe nose.  David raises his knee, kicking Peter in the stomac Peter doubles over.  David picks up a lamp off the desk a smashes it over Peter's head.  Peter drops to the ground. David picks up his knife and walks over to Peter, then li his head out of the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They took everything from me -- because of you --  and now I'm going to take everything from you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David opens the door to the alcove, then walks back to Pe He bends down and presses the BLADE to Peter's neck.  For moment we sense he is going to kill Peter, then, he grabs by the hair, lifting his head up so he can see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER'S POV:  Erica is sitting in the alcove, tied to the chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter is only semi-conscious.  David starts to leave.  Da just about at the alcove door when Frank enters the room, weapon drawn.  Then looks at Peter, then David.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (moving towards Frank)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God you're here.  I heard Erica scream and came in to see what was going on.  Mister Sanderson was going to stab her. (holds up the knife)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank looks at the knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FRANK'S POV:  There is a DEEP CUT on David's wrist, exact like Peter's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank's face registers the cut.  David notes it.  Before can even look at him, David thrusts the blade into his st The force drives Frank back against the wall.  His gun dr from his hand as Frank slides to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter tries to grab David's leg as he heads towards the a Frank pulls up his pant leg revealing his backup gun.  He to reach for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David enters the room.  Through the STEAM he sees Kathy t to untie Erica.  David stares at them, his lips spread in maniacal grin.  The OVERHEAD LIGHTS FLASH on and off intermittently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't going to help, David. You're mother's dead.  You can't undo it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I do.  I found your file.  I know what happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They took away the game because of him. My father left and my mother...  There was so much blood... It covered everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, but this isn't going to bring her back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you see?  I had to make it right. I ignored my mother's crossing.  I sat with them all.  I held their hands.  I stroked their hair.  I was with them to the end.  I took away the blood.  I washed them.  Their crossing was peaceful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think your mother knows that now. Why don't you put the knife down.  Put it down, David.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment it appears he is thinking about it.  He lowe blade, but his need to kill is to strong.  He raises it a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has to die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His face tenses.  He lunges towards Erica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANG!  A shot tears through his chest.  The impact blows off his feet.  He falls back into the murky water and disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter stands in the doorway, straining to stay conscious, Frank's GUN aimed at David.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kathy quickly finishes untying Erica.  They run to the co of the room.  Kathy holds her close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter slowly staggers forward.  He probes the water with feet, checking for David's body.  The MURKY WATER, THE ST and the BLINKING LIGHTS don't make it easy.  Peter leans pointing the gun at the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER'S POV:  The MURKY WATER.  Suddenly, a HAND streaks the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hand grabs Peter around the neck.  David stands up qu They struggle over the gun.  They both fall backwards int water.  Peter surfaces and crawls backwards.  David stand They locks eyes.  Peter stares back with a deadly calmnes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The game's over, asshole!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David starts to lunge for him.  Peter empties the GUN int His body jerks backwards violently, smashing into the wal then he slides down and dies, slowly disappearing under t surface of the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLACK and WHITE UNITS fill the area, their RED LIGHTS FLA UNIFORMED OFFICERS hold back the CROWD of on-lookers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter sits off to the side.  He looks worn to the point o exhaustion.  A PARAMEDIC attends to the wounds on his fac Erica sits beside him, clinging to his arm.  TWO MEN carr STRETCHER, the body on it is covered.  Peter stares at it blankly as it passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kathy is standing at the rear of an AMBULANCE.  The doors and it drives off.  She walks over to Peter and Erica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank's going to be alright.  They don't think any major arteries were severed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The information doesn't seem to register with Peter.  He continues to stare ahead blankly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter, you beat him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slowly looks over at her, but says nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You beat him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a girl in the hospital who is going to live because of you.  You made a difference.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter just continues to stare at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter, I'm sorry I doubted you, but--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter reaches forwards and places his fingers on her lips

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just wanted you to know in case you thought about it in the future.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we have a future?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat.  Kathy leans in a kisses him.  Erica smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yurilivich is at his seat.  The seat across the board fro is vacant.  THE AUDIENCE waits, silently.  THE PRESIDENT: Checks his watch, then gets up to address the crowd.  We the SOUND of DOORS opening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHESSBOARD CLOCK:  It TICKS methodically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON YURILIVICH'S HAND:  his fingers taps on the tabl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KATHY AND ERICA:  in the audience.  Kathy checks her watc She is anxious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter enters and limps towards the stage.  Slowly he clim steps, then sits down across from Yurilivich.  He looks o into the audience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kathy smiles.  Erica nods to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON PETER:  He looks at the board and makes a move, hits his timer.  Slowly he looks up at Yurilivich.  A hug smile covers his face.
